text.config.rainbowbridge-config.title: Rainbow Bridge Options
tooltip.rainbowbridge.collar.info: Use to make your tamed pet invulnerable. Pets with collars can be tracked in the Roster. Sneak right click on a block to set home point.
tooltip.rainbowbridge.roster.info: Tracks pets with the Collar applied. Sneak right click while holding to set the default home point for all pets
